pr_title: Don't skip WAGED rebalancer calculation even the resource list is empty.

timeline.message:
Don't skip WAGED rebalancer calculation even the resource list is empty.

This change is to allow the rebalancer logic cleans up the internal assignment state and cache if all the resources are removed from the cluster.

timeline.bodyText: This is not related to the code change, right?
timeline.author: NealSun96

replies.bodyText: It is the issue that we want to fix.
replies.author: jiajunwang

replies.bodyText: Without the change, this test will fail.
replies.author: jiajunwang
